019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.io.Writer;
027import java.lang.reflect.UndeclaredThrowableException;
028import java.net.UnixDomainSocketAddress;
029import java.nio.file.Files;
030import java.nio.file.Path;
031import java.time.Duration;
032import java.util.LinkedList;
033import java.util.Queue;
034import java.util.logging.Level;
035import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand;
036import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand.Command.CONTINUE;
037import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommandCompleted;
038import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorReady;
039import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorResult;
040import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
041import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
042import org.jgrapes.core.Components;
043import org.jgrapes.core.Components.Timer;
044import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
045import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
046import org.jgrapes.core.events.Stop;
047import org.jgrapes.io.events.Closed;
048import org.jgrapes.io.events.ConnectError;
049import org.jgrapes.io.events.Input;
050import org.jgrapes.io.events.OpenSocketConnection;
051import org.jgrapes.io.util.ByteBufferWriter;
052import org.jgrapes.io.util.LineCollector;
053import org.jgrapes.net.SocketIOChannel;
054import org.jgrapes.net.events.ClientConnected;
055import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
056import org.jgrapes.util.events.FileChanged;
057import org.jgrapes.util.events.FileChanged.Kind;
058import org.jgrapes.util.events.WatchFile;
059
060/**
061 * A component that handles the communication over the Qemu monitor
062 * socket.
063 * 
064 * If the log level for this class is set to fine, the messages 
065 * exchanged on the monitor socket are logged.
066 */
067@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
068public class QemuMonitor extends Component {
069
070    private static ObjectMapper mapper;
071    private static JsonNode connect;
072    private static JsonNode cont;
073    private static JsonNode powerdown;
074
075    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
076    private Path socketPath;
077    private int powerdownTimeout;
078    private SocketIOChannel monitorChannel;
079    private final Queue<String> executing = new LinkedList<>();
080    private Stop suspendedStop;
081    private Timer powerdownTimer;
082
083    /**
084     * Instantiates a new qemu monitor.
085     *
086     * @param componentChannel the component channel
087     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
088     */
089    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AssignmentToNonFinalStatic")
090    public QemuMonitor(Channel componentChannel) throws IOException {
091        super(componentChannel);
092        if (mapper == null) {
093            mapper = new ObjectMapper();
094            try {
095                connect = mapper.readValue("{ \"execute\": "
096                    + "\"qmp_capabilities\" }", JsonNode.class);
097                cont = mapper.readValue("{ \"execute\": "
098                    + "\"cont\" }", JsonNode.class);
099                powerdown = mapper.readValue("{ \"execute\": "
100                    + "\"system_powerdown\" }", JsonNode.class);
101            } catch (IOException e) {
102                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
103                    () -> "Cannot initialize class: " + e.getMessage());
104            }
105        }
106        attach(new RamController(channel(), this));
107        attach(new CpuController(channel(), this));
108        attach(new CdromController(channel(), this));
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * As the configuration of this component depends on the configuration
113     * of the {@link Runner}, it doesn't have a handler for the 
114     * {@link ConfigurationUpdate} event. The values are forwarded from the
115     * {@link Runner} instead.
116     *
117     * @param socketPath the socket path
118     * @param powerdownTimeout 
119     */
120    /* default */ void configure(Path socketPath, int powerdownTimeout) {
121        this.socketPath = socketPath;
122        this.powerdownTimeout = powerdownTimeout;
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * Handle the start event.
127     *
128     * @param event the event
129     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
130     */
131    @Handler
132    public void onStart(Start event) throws IOException {
133        if (socketPath == null) {
134            return;
135        }
136        Files.deleteIfExists(socketPath);
137        fire(new WatchFile(socketPath));
138    }
139
140    /**
141     * Watch for the creation of the swtpm socket and start the
142     * qemu process if it has been created.
143     *
144     * @param event the event
145     */
146    @Handler
147    public void onFileChanged(FileChanged event) {
148        if (event.change() == Kind.CREATED && event.path().equals(socketPath)) {
149            // qemu running, open socket
150            fire(new OpenSocketConnection(
151                UnixDomainSocketAddress.of(socketPath))
152                    .setAssociated(QemuMonitor.class, this));
153        }
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Check if this is from opening the monitor socket and if true,
158     * save the socket in the context and associate the channel with
159     * the context. Then send the initial message to the socket.
160     *
161     * @param event the event
162     * @param channel the channel
163     */
164    @Handler
165    public void onClientConnected(ClientConnected event,
166            SocketIOChannel channel) {
167        event.openEvent().associated(QemuMonitor.class).ifPresent(qm -> {
168            monitorChannel = channel;
169            channel.setAssociated(QemuMonitor.class, this);
170            channel.setAssociated(Writer.class, new ByteBufferWriter(
171                channel).nativeCharset());
172            channel.setAssociated(LineCollector.class,
173                new LineCollector()
174                    .consumer(line -> {
175                        try {
176                            processMonitorInput(line);
177                        } catch (IOException e) {
178                            throw new UndeclaredThrowableException(e);
179                        }
180                    }));
181            sendToMonitor(connect);
182        });
183    }
184
185    /**
186     * Called when a connection attempt fails.
187     *
188     * @param event the event
189     * @param channel the channel
190     */
191    @Handler
192    public void onConnectError(ConnectError event, SocketIOChannel channel) {
193        event.event().associated(QemuMonitor.class).ifPresent(qm -> {
194            fire(new Stop());
195        });
196    }
197
198    /* default */ void sendToMonitor(JsonNode message) {
199        String asText;
200        try {
201            asText = mapper.writeValueAsString(message);
202        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
203            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
204                () -> "Cannot serialize Json: " + e.getMessage());
205            return;
206        }
207        logger.fine(() -> "monitor(out): " + asText);
208        synchronized (executing) {
209            if (message.has("execute")) {
210                executing.add(message.get("execute").asText());
211            }
212            monitorChannel.associated(Writer.class).ifPresent(writer -> {
213                try {
214                    writer.append(asText).append('\n').flush();
215                } catch (IOException e) {
216                    // Cannot happen, but...
217                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e, () -> e.getMessage());
218                }
219            });
220
221        }
222    }
223
224    /**
225     * Handle data from qemu monitor connection.
226     *
227     * @param event the event
228     * @param channel the channel
229     */
230    @Handler
231    public void onInput(Input<?> event, SocketIOChannel channel) {
232        if (channel.associated(QemuMonitor.class).isEmpty()) {
233            return;
234        }
235        channel.associated(LineCollector.class).ifPresent(collector -> {
236            collector.feed(event);
237        });
238    }
239
240    private void processMonitorInput(String line)
241            throws IOException {
242        logger.fine(() -> "monitor(in): " + line);
243        try {
244            var response = mapper.readValue(line, ObjectNode.class);
245            if (response.has("QMP")) {
246                fire(new MonitorReady());
247                return;
248            }
249            if (response.has("return") || response.has("error")) {
250                String executed = executing.poll();
251                logger.fine(
252                    () -> String.format("(Previous \"monitor(in)\" is result "
253                        + "from executing %s)", executed));
254                fire(new MonitorResult(executed, response));
255                return;
256            }
257        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
258            throw new IOException(e);
259        }
260    }
261
262    /**
263     * On closed.
264     *
265     * @param event the event
266     */
267    @Handler
268    public void onClosed(Closed<?> event, SocketIOChannel channel) {
269        channel.associated(QemuMonitor.class).ifPresent(qm -> {
270            monitorChannel = null;
271            synchronized (this) {
272                if (suspendedStop != null) {
273                    if (powerdownTimer != null) {
274                        powerdownTimer.cancel();
275                    }
276                    suspendedStop.resumeHandling();
277                    suspendedStop = null;
278                }
279            }
280        });
281    }
282
283    /**
284     * On monitor command.
285     *
286     * @param event the event
287     */
288    @Handler
289    public void onMonitorCommand(MonitorCommand event) {
290        if (event.command() != CONTINUE) {
291            return;
292        }
293        sendToMonitor(cont);
294        fire(new MonitorCommandCompleted(event.command(), null));
295    }
296
297    /**
298     * Shutdown the VM.
299     *
300     * @param event the event
301     */
302    @Handler(priority = 100)
303    public void onStop(Stop event) {
304        if (monitorChannel != null) {
305            // We have a connection to Qemu, attempt ACPI shutdown.
306            event.suspendHandling();
307            suspendedStop = event;
308            sendToMonitor(powerdown);
309
310            // Schedule timer as fallback
311            powerdownTimer = Components.schedule(t -> {
312                synchronized (this) {
313                    if (suspendedStop != null) {
314                        suspendedStop.resumeHandling();
315                        suspendedStop = null;
316                    }
317                }
318            }, Duration.ofSeconds(powerdownTimeout));
319        }
320    }
321}
